com.google.publicalerts.cap

Class XercesCapExceptionMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.XercesCapExceptionMapper

  • public class XercesCapExceptionMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Attempts to map Reasons of type CapException.ReasonType.OTHER derived from Xerces-generated SAXParseExceptions to reasons with more descriptive CapException.ReasonTypes and error messages specific to CAP.

    Implementation note: Translation is done by parsing the messages generated by the Xerces schema validator. Other validators are not guaranteed to produce the same error messages. The goal is to push as much of the validation as possible out of code and into the .xsd.

      • map

        public CapException map(CapException exception)

        exception - the exception with reasons to map
        Returns:
        a new exception with mapped reasons
        See Also:
        map(Reasons)

      • map

        public Reasons map(Reasons reasons)
        Attempts to map Reasons of type CapException.ReasonType.OTHER derived from Xerces-generated SAXParseExceptions to reasons with more descriptive CapException.ReasonTypes and error messages specific to CAP.

        Each Reason is expected to have 3 message parameters; the first is the SAXParseException error message; the second is the localName of the element being parsed at the time of the exception; the third is any characters that had been parsed at the time of the exception.

        Parameters:
        reasons - the reasons to map
        Returns:
        the mapped reasons
